aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: I am a software developer with a recent focus on Data Science. I have worked with .NET, SQL Server, and automation, but in 2025 I began a formal transition towards data analysis and modeling. I have explored real challenges such as the WiDS 2022 datathon (breast cancer detection) and WiDS 2025 (ADHD detection in women). I am currently training in various data science tools with the goal of building complete end-to-end projects by early 2026. My solid engineering background allows me to approach data science from a practical, structured, and product-oriented perspective.

skills.title: Skills and Technologies
skills.applicationsList: PowerBI, Excel, Visual Studio, Visual Studio Code
skills.closing: I stand out for my passion for continuous learning and adaptability to new technologies. I am building my path towards data science while strengthening my software development skills.

goals.title: Professional Goal
goals.description: Evolve towards Data Science roles while continuing to grow as a Full Stack Developer.
goals.journeyDescription: My journey through technology led me to study Information Technology Engineering at UTAN campus industrias in 2022. What I am passionate about development is the creative process of building customized solutions for each project to solve. My experience developing desktop applications strengthened my interest in creating solutions that directly impact the user experience. This path has led me to be interested in data science, where I see the potential to combine development with data analysis to create more complete solutions. I stay updated by following industry leaders and developing personal projects. My methodical and proactive approach, along with my passion for continuous optimization, defines my work style.
